pullRequest.title: Simplify Java programming exercise templates based on new artemis-java-test-sandbox version
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist

 I tested all changes and all related features with different users (student, tutor, instructor, admin) on the test server https://artemistest.ase.in.tum.de.

Motivation and Context
Simplify the template, move test classes (which do not change between projects) into artemis-java-test-sandbox and use them based on the downloaded maven dependency
Steps for Testing

Create multiple programming exercises. Create in total 6 exercises:


Java/ Non-Sequential/ Maven project type
Java/ Non-Sequential/ Eclipse project type
Java/ Sequential/ Maven project type
Java/ Sequential/ Eclipse project type
Kotlin/ Non-Sequential
Kotlin/ Sequential


Try out that the tests for template and solution are still working properly
Participate in the exercises
Make a submission and check that everything still works

Related artemis-java-test-sandbox PR: ls1intum/Ares#62

commit.message: simplify Java programming exercise templates based on new artemis-java-test-sandbox version
Remove copying of testUtils as they moved to Ares
Remove Todos from kotlin template solution
adjust test.json and fix security issue with kotlin libraries
Add temporary snapshot repositories for testing purposes

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                        <version>1.3.5-SNAPSHOT</version> <!-- TODO: update to 1.3.4 when released -->
          
          
            
                        <version>1.4.0</version>
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -18,22 +18,20 @@
         <analyzeTests>false</analyzeTests>
         %static-code-analysis-stop%
     </properties>
+    <repositories>
+        <repository>
+            <id>snapshots-repo</id>
+            <url>https://oss.sonatype.org/content/repositories/snapshots</url>
+            <releases><enabled>false</enabled></releases>
+            <snapshots><enabled>true</enabled></snapshots>
+        </repository>
+    </repositories>
     <dependencies>
         <dependency>
             <!-- Comes with JUnit 5, AssertJ and Hamcrest. JUnit 4 (JUnit 5 Vintage) or jqwik need to be added explicitly -->
             <groupId>de.tum.in.ase</groupId>
             <artifactId>artemis-java-test-sandbox</artifactId>
-            <version>1.3.4</version>
-        </dependency>
-        <dependency>
-            <groupId>org.json</groupId>
-            <artifactId>json</artifactId>
-            <version>20190722</version>
-        </dependency>
-        <dependency>
-            <groupId>me.xdrop</groupId>
-            <artifactId>fuzzywuzzy</artifactId>
-            <version>1.2.0</version>
+            <version>1.3.5-SNAPSHOT</version> <!-- TODO: update to 1.3.4 when released -->

nodes.bodyText:
It would be a good idea to add the AJTS annotations here as well. (Can be the same as in the behavior)
We currently initialize the classes AFAIK.
This should then be replaced by strict timeout.
The same holds for the other three.
The same holds for the other three.
